mapper.select: SELECT A.SNSBOARD_SEQ AS snsboardSeq, A.SNSBOARD_SUBJECT AS snsboardSubject, A.SNSBOARD_CONTENT AS snsboardContent, A.SNSBOARD_REGDATE AS snsboardRegdate, A.SNSBOARD_BLIND AS snsboardBlind, A.SNSBOARD_STAT AS snsboardStat, A.USER_EMAIL_ID_FK AS userEmailIdFk , B.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName,B.CATEGORY_STAT AS categoryStat FROM SNSBOARD A INNER JOIN CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATEGORY_SEQ_FK = B.CATEGORY_SEQ ORDER BY SNSBOARD_SEQ DESC LIMIT 0 ,5;
